name: Ramsey Theory
description: Ramsey theory states that complete disorder is impossible. It explores how order emerges in large enough structures.

name: Splines
description: Splines are smooth curves used in computer graphics and interpolation.

name: Prime Numbers
description: Prime numbers are integers greater than 1 that have no divisors other than 1 and themselves.

name: Voronoi Diagrams
description: Voronoi diagrams divide a space into regions based on distance to a set of points. Each region contains all points closer to its associated seed than to any other.

name: Markov Chains
description: Markov chains model systems that transition between states, where the probability of each state depends only on the previous state.

name: Game Theory
description: Game theory analyzes strategic interactions where the outcome depends on the actions of all participants.

visuals.description: Visualization of a game theory problem.
